description: The new SportGrip for the latest generation 6" display Kindle puts the fun in functional. Designed with both the stylish and practical reader in mind, this durable, one-piece skin provides easy access to all ports, buttons and speakers. Utilizing high-grade colorful silicone, the SportGrip offers a precision molded fit with front, corner, back, and side cushioned protection. From its ergonomic, impact-resistant skin to its non-slip texturing on the back and page turn buttons, this case was made to perform. So, relax and have fun, because with the SportGrip, you can take your Kindle with you–without worry.
